Package com.github.zxhr.gradle.xtext

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractXtextPlugin<C extends ISubGradleProjectConfig>
    Configures the project as follows: Sets the default ISubGradleProjectConfig.getProjectName() to Project.getName() Sets the default ISubGradleProjectConfig.getSrcDirectory() to the first directory in the java source set. Sets the default ISubGradleProjectConfig.getSrcGenDirectory() to Project.getBuildDir()/src-gen/<sourceSetName>/java. Sets the default ISubGradleProjectConfig.getMetaInfDirectory() to Project.getBuildDir()/src-gen/<sourceSetName>/resources/META-INF If applicable, sets the default IBundleGradleProjectConfig.getManifest() to ISubGradleProjectConfig.getMetaInfDirectory()/MANIFEST.MF. If applicable, sets the default IBundleGradleProjectConfig.getPluginXml() to Project.getBuildDir()/src-gen/<sourceSetName>/resources/plugin.xml If applicable, sets the default IRuntimeGradleProjectConfig.getEcoreModelDirectory() to Project.getBuildDir()/src-gen/<sourceSetName>/resources/model If applicable, sets the default IWebGradleProjectConfig.getAssetsDirectory() to Project.getBuildDir()/src-gen/<sourceSetName>/resources/assets Adds the ISubGradleProjectConfig.getSrcGenDirectory() to the java source set directory Adds the parent directories of ISubGradleProjectConfig.getMetaInfDirectory(), IBundleGradleProjectConfig.getPluginXml(), IRuntimeGradleProjectConfig.getEcoreModelDirectory(), and IWebGradleProjectConfig.getAssetsDirectory() (when applicable) to the resource source set directory
    ConfigurePde
    Task for configuring a project for Eclipse PDE.
    GenerateMwe2
    Task for generating an Xtext project.
    XtextEclipsePluginPlugin
    Plugin that configures the XtextRootProjectExtension.getEclipsePluginConfig() with this project.
    XtextEclipsePluginTestPlugin
    Plugin that configures the XtextRootProjectExtension.getEclipsePluginTestConfig() with this project.
    XtextGenericIdePlugin
    Plugin that configures the XtextRootProjectExtension.getGenericIdeConfig() with this project.
    XtextRootProjectExtension
    Configuration for Xtext projects, analogous to IXtextProjectConfig.
    XtextRootProjectPlugin  
    XtextRuntimePlugin
    Plugin that configures the XtextRootProjectExtension.getRuntimeConfig() with this project.
    XtextRuntimeTestPlugin
    Plugin that configures the XtextRootProjectExtension.getRuntimeTestConfig() with this project.
    XtextWebPlugin
    Plugin that configures the XtextRootProjectExtension.getWebConfig() with this project.
